content: Hello!

This is just a reminder that you can sign up to phone bank, canvass, get trainings  or take other actions at https://events.democrats.org/ in your state or in one of our battleground states (NC, PA, GA, NH, WI, PA, MI, AZ, NV). Volunteers like you make all the difference! We look forward to seeing you at an event soon.
## [South Carolina Voter Information](https://www.vote.org/state/south-carolina/)
Pinned a message.
Hello all! Excited to learn more about how we are organizing in SC!
As far as I can tell, the best way to get involved locally in SC is to reach out to your closest Democratic Party office- for me it‚Äôs Charleston County Democratic Party

Hi all! I was born and raised in South Carolina and now living in Louisiana. I recently learned that Louisiana has more registered Democrats than Republicans! Decided to look up South Carolina's statistics and as of November 2023, voter registrations are neck and neck however Republicans have almost double the turnout!
I‚Äôm guessing this is a measure of people who have voted in a party‚Äôs primary, rather than ‚Äúregistered‚Äù since we don‚Äôt register by party in SC?

<a:star_wave:1269735420359606369> Hey, Team! We know you want to help make a difference! Did you know though that hosting a debate watch party is an amazing way to get involved and bring people together? <a:rainbow_heart_scribble:1269029739432120465> It‚Äôs all about good vibes, great conversations, and getting folks fired up for the election. Your watch party could be the spark that motivates someone to vote! <a:PinkFlames:1252802562659193004>  [Register your watch party](https://events.democrats.org/c/host-a-debate-watch-party/event/create/) to get access to all sorts of resources for throwing a successful debate watch party, including a [Host Information Session](https://events.democrats.org/event/677337/). <a:ThanksRainbow:1278765693579431967>
https://www.mobilize.us/voteriders/event/564817/?referring_vol=6684605&rname=Michael&share_context=event_details&share_medium=copy_link

Very interested to see how to go about this. I live in SC and only recently became aware of how many Democrats we have. I think many may be like me and just assumed we were outnumbered. I voted Republican for 5 decades almost exclusively. But after Trump, I will never vote for another Republican or anyone I know of Republican elected officials who have enabled him. I would love to find more voters like me and encourage them not only to vote for Harris -Walz, but to volunteer if they would like to. I  know I'm not the only one. Recently, some of us new and old Dems met up for breakfast at a local restaurant, wearing Harris tees, etc. Unheard of previously!! Thank you for this tip.

We live in Maryland but have a condo in Garden City near Myrtle Beach. After I'm down here, I go back to MD fired up - Maryland is a bubble but I go back knowing how much work has to be done in the rest of the country!!!! I'll be wearing my ,-la shirt and I also have a Kamala shirt in Hebrew. I hope the people ask me what the shirt says! üôÇ
I live in Columbia SC.  Been here since 2003 as a first sergeant in the U.S. army - now federal employee.  Public affairs - keeping our country informed the right way!
I teach line dance in the community. Let‚Äôs get together and I can teach you all the kamala groove.  Let‚Äôs take it virtually as a mob dance.
Let's get a volunteer wave going! Repond on a thread with how many events you signed up to! Let's make the goal 5+  https://events.democrats.org/?country=US&state=SC
Is there a place in mobilize where we can see a total?  I have lost track hahaha.  Thanks!
I think if you login and scroll to the bottom! üôÇ

On this day 4 years ago, a record 3.3 million Americans cast their ballot early.  And as expected, only 1.7 million early votes have been cast (a 45% decrease).  Please use the link below or call the Democratic Voter Assistance Hotline 9am-9pm (EST) (1-833-336-8683) to request an absentee ballot, or make a plan to vote early or on election day.  https://iwillvote.com/

Hey friends, four years ago, we sent President Biden to the White House with one of the largest popular vote margins in history, thanks to support from all 50 states, blue and red alike. A bigger margin makes it harder for Trump and MAGA Republicans to challenge the election. The work we do in these last two weeks is crucial.

Visit: https://iwillvote.com/
Call: Democratic Voter Assistance Hotline (833-336-8683)

Let's ensure Kamala Harris is elected!
